# 𒃴

𒃴 GALAM 𒃲 gal.um [227x] = height, altitude <> 𒆪𒌌 kūl ≈ 𒃴 ≈ gal

𒃴 GALAM ≈ climb *klimbaną klimmen <> cliff *gley glue clay 𒂡 klembra

𒃴 GALAᵛ geeli elevate levitate 𒃴 GALAᵛ in 𒄑𒃴 ĝeš'gala scālae scala scale <> scandō scan, ascend, descend #simmiltu 𒃴 GALAᵛ in 𒃴 clever 𒃻𒃴 šágala skill, skilled, skilful ^^

𒃴 SUKUD 𒌌 sakkad

𒃴 ŠUKUD šu-ku > šu-ug šukussu šukusu Akk. ‘subsistence holding’ IE seǵʰ-os

𒃴 SUKUDᵉ ˢhoogte "height" 𒃴 SUKUDᵉ висок visokᵈᵉ •visokta высота́ vysotá височина́ visočiná “high, height” 𒃴 SUKUDᵉ S'Güte 高さ takasa 高度 kōdo 高度 gāodù 고도 godo greatness "height" 𒃴 SUKUDᵉ section? "height, altitude" 𒃴 SUKUD ύψος ýpsos υψόμετρο ypsómetro "height" 𒃴 SUKUD yüksəkᵈᵉ ˢyüksəklik "height" 𒃴 SUKUD ᵐᵃSUKUD magasság megaság ƒ

𒃴 ≈ 𒉏

A'fish : 𒆩 pisces 𒃴 vs 𒆨 𒉏 NIM 𒈾 𓆛
